Width: 3.25"
Top Diameter: 2.5"
Base Diameter: 2"
Stemless design ensures stability during transportation
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Stemless Wine Glasses

Clear, convenient and so very classy! Our clear plastic wine glasses will impart an air of luxury to your daily dining, wine tasting parties, weddings, cocktail parties, and other celebratory events. Crystal clear plastic construction in classy stemless cylinder shape is elegantly highlighted by shiny metallic gold rim for an added look of luxury. Use our splendid disposable champagne cups to share the toast of festivity with your friends and family.

Gold Rimmed Design

Serve with style with our catchy collection of sophisticated Gold Rimmed Wine Glasses that offer the convenience of disposability with the charm of crystal clear plastic that mimics the refinement of real glass. Contemporary shape and sleek metallic rim add to the regal charm of these stemless champagne flutes, making them perfect for high-end events and posh parties.

     

Wine Goblets

Transform your conventional dining experience into an elegant affair with these classy goblets fashioned in contemporary design and chic shape. Your guests will be startled and awe-struck on the sophisticated presentation of these top-notch glasses. Sturdy plastic material lets you serve your favorite beverages without spilling or leaking. The attribute of disposability makes the cleanup time a breeze for any occasion.

 

Additional Information:

  • Great for serving wines, specialty drinks, or water at restaurants, bars, and catered events
  • WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe

  • Medium Vase Neck Length: 9.5"

  • Order is for Vases only. Flowers and other decorations are not included.
  • Note: There is a slight dip in each vase. it is not a flat surface.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

A highly efficient and stylish accessory to cove under-cabinet, display, and other accent lighting applications including signage, interior/exterior lighting, back lighting, accent lighting, landscape lighting, club lighting, bar lighting, architectural lighting and so many other DIY lighting projects. Our LED tape strip is flexible, subtle and long-life. Our assorted color LED strip is versatile and performs amazing functions of flashing, strobing, fading and smoothing with stunning hues of red, yellow, blue, green, and white. These luminous LED ribbon tapes come with strong 5M adhesive sticky backing that helps in easy mounting on most surfaces. These LED Strips are UL listed in numerous categories for all domestic and commercial applications. Create whimsical indoor or outdoor party ambiance with our Lustrous Luminaries LED Tape Strips. 

Additional Information:

  • Item is sold as an LED Strip Extension only
  • Power Supply Adapter not included
  • Up to 2xLED Strips can be connected(max.)
  • The LED Strip connected by wire will not be as bright as the LED Strip connected by adapter as it is not getting direct electricity supplied by adapter
  • Instruction Video Included (Click on the Youtube logo in Photo Gallery)
  • Recommended Power Supply Adapter--get specs based on Attached Pic in Photo Gallery
  • Attached below is a picture of the Step-By-Step Instructions on this Item

Features:

  • Low power consumption, Super-bright but running with low temperature
  • All the light spread and completely smooth, luminous very even 
  • Every 3-LEDS cuttable without damaging the rest strips, according to your requirement
  • Self-Adhesive back with Adhesive tape for secure and easy application
  • LED Type: High Quality 5050 SMD LED, high intensity and reliability, Long lifespan >50,000 hours 

Note:

  • Even the strip light is of IP65 waterproof design, only the surface is cover with waterproof PU material, in case of electric shock and degummed, please do not soak it in the water.

Top Depth: 26"
Base Diameter: 9.5"
Base Depth: 5.5"
Glass Thickness: 2-3mm 
Style: Trumpet Glass Vase
Features: Reversible, hand-crafted, eye-catching design, versatile and sturdy
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Note : Flowers and other decorations are not included
  • Uses : Modern flower vase, wedding centerpiece, table top centerpiece vase, floor vase, and also suitable for any setting like weddings, parties, offices, and home

How to Care:

  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.
